items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I was a beautiful bride in black.
items.body: I had no wedding dress a week before my wedding (i got ripped off) and was on the search for next day shipping dresses on here.. which options were not many so I’m glad i found this dress!! It fit me true to size (even the length was perfect) and it accentuates your curves. I was really impressed with the quality, it is sturdy and comfortable, all that for a great price. It looks so elegant and the color is very rich. I followed another reviewer and got myself a waist accessory to give it a pop of color. Highly recommend this dress for formal events or like in my case, a wedding if thats your thing! Read more
items.author: Michella

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: Excellent fit! Purchased size M. I'm 5"2 and usually wear size 6 and this dress was perfect! The material was easy to iron. Enough stretch if needed and very flattering! I thought the length was going to be an issue but it wasn't. Would def recommend! Read more
items.author: MsAri

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy this dress
items.body: I had a black tie wedding to go to and last minute ordered this dress in medium, turns out to be one of my favorite Amazon purchases. It looks so classy and the fabric is nice and thick. It hugs you in all the right places and the off the shoulder is crafted perfectly to stay that way all night without too much tugging and pulling. I ordered a size medium and I’m 5’10” 160 lbs. I wore about a three inch heel and it sit nicely above my shoes. Didn’t touch the ground but didn’t look to short either. I was able to dance and move while still looking classy. Got tons of compliments! Look no further! Read more
items.author: Onnie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great material and fit!!!
items.body: Exceeded expectations on “quality” feel. As others said material is nice thickness of scuba material. Hugs curves. Sooo flattering! Looks way more expensive. The neckline is a bit awkward and have to keep pulling down into place. Other than that feels way better than the price point. Worth it! Took a lot of steaming to get wrinkles out. Read more
items.author: Nicole L Deshong

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect
items.body: Great dress. Very comfortable and fit was perfect! I’ve never had a dress fit this well without alterations. Material is thick and quality. Looks much more expensive than you would think. Btw, I’m short 5’4” and don’t wear high heels. I have on aerosol block heels. The length was perfect. Read more
items.author: Leann Gibson-Griffin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: I am thrilled with this dress! I bought it for a gala and haven’t worn it for the event yet but just tried it on. I am 5’3” so it does hang on the ground when barefoot but with just 2” heels or so it hits the floor just right. It’s a beautiful shape and beautiful fabric that is thick but not hot. It’s got enough stretch where it feels incredibly comfortable and not like I’m wearing a formal dress but looks very elegant. I will be wearing spanx because it is form fitting around the stomach and hips, but still not tight do doesn’t feel uncomfortable - just shows everything. The shoulders drape just like the picture and if it goes off one shoulder, it does make the seam look a bit sideways in the back, but for some reason, not the other shoulder. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Recommend for the money.
items.body: I am 5'2 165 lbs and ordered a large. I wore the dress with platform sneakers. a heel of some sort is definitely needed. The dress is designed for a longer torso so I couldn't get the off the shoulder look to work so I just wore a jacket. as you can see from pic this gave it a weird neckline. The material is thick so did get a bit warm. what I love is that when the dress arrived I threw it in the washer and then the dryer, ran a steam iron across it and it was ready to wear. When I got home I had a stain across the front where I brushed up against something threw it in the washer again. I would not wear this to a black-tie type affair but for a semi formal fund raiser this was perfect. Read more
items.author: tls78754

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress you
items.body: Have a holiday black tie event and was not sure if this dress was going to meet my expectations as I am 5’ and about 190. This dress is amazing quality, looks amazing and I can’t wait to wear it for the special day. Since I’m so darn short, I simply took it to the cleaners and had it measured to my size. The fit of the dress is amazing and accentuates my frame. Price even with cleaners bill is well worth it. Will post pics on the big day Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Bodycon Sleeveless Off Shoulder Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Bodycon Sleeveless Off Shoulder Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Bodycon Sleeveless Off Shoulder Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Winered, Navy, White, Purple, Peacock Blue, Rose, Royal Blue, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
